resources.string: An unknown error has occurred. Please contact office@senmicro.biz so that we can determine the source of the issue and attempt to fix it.

The Android OS version that you are running is missing the com.android.future.usb library that is required to run this demo. The OS version that you are running should contain these libraries. Please contact office@senmicro.biz so that we can work to correct this issue for this device.

The firmware version on the attached device requires a protocol that is not supported by this version of the application. Please check the Android Marketplace to see if there is an update available for this application. If you are using the source version, please check www.senmicro.biz for the latest application source code.
Add Geofences: Failure, error code %1$d GeofenceRequestIds=%2$s
Can\'t add geofences, previous request hasn\'t finished.
Invalid latitude(s). Must be in the range -90 to 90 degrees
Invalid longitude(s). Must be in the range -180 to 180 degrees
Invalid radius(s). Must be 1 meter or greater.
Geofence transition error. Invalid type %1$d in geofences %2$s
Click notification to return to app
Invalid action received. See error log for details.
Latitude should be in the range -90 to 90 degrees
Longitude should be in the range -180 to 180 degrees
Removing geofences by request id failed: error code %1$d GeofenceRequestIds=%2$s
Can\'t remove geofences, previous request hasn\'t finished.
Removing geofences by request ids succeeded: request ids: %1$s
Removing all geofences failed: error code %1$d
Google Play services: unable to resolve connection error.
Radius must be greater than or equal to 0
Received an unknown activity request code %1$d in onActivityResult.
